snippet: The imminent opening of an enrichment site confronts the United States and its allies with difficult choices about how far to go to limit Iran’s nuclear abilities.
abstract: Iran's Atomic Energy Organization announces the country is on verge of starting production at its second major uranium enrichment site, in a defiant declaration that its nuclear program will continue despite international sanctions restricting its oil revenue; imminent opening of site near the city of Qum confronts the United States and its allies with difficult choices about how far to go to limit Iran's nuclear abilities.
lead_paragraph: The imminent opening of an enrichment site confronts the United States and its allies with difficult choices about how far to go to limit Iran’s nuclear abilities.

headline.seo: Iran Trumpets Nuclear Ability at Second Location
headline.main: Iran Trumpets Nuclear Ability at a Second Location
headline.print_headline: Iran Trumpets Nuclear Ability At a 2nd Plant
